conclusion: Violation of P1-1;Violation of Art. 8;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic and Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF TULESHOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA - [Russian Translation]
scl: Former King of Greece and Others, [GC], no. 25701/94, § 89, ECHR 2000-XII;McCann and Others v. the United Kingdom, judgment of 27 September 1995, Series A no. 324, § 220;Papachelas v. Greece [GC], no. 31423/96, § 48, ECHR 1999-II
